title: NAACP Image Awards, NFL Playoffs, National Championship Game and more.
itunes:title: NAACP Image Awards, NFL Playoffs, National Championship Game and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today's show is dedicated to those with Attention Deficit Disorder. If you can't pay attention that good, what we ask you to do today is PAY ATTENTION! Big Dog gives us the details of his travel schedule this past weekend. Uncle Steve is among the nominees for the NAACP Image Awards. Junior talks about the upcoming Championship Sunday. Loni Love made controversial comments about black men. Tonight is the College Football National Championship Game in NOLA. Nancy Pelosi will be sending two articles of impeachment to Senate. Meghan Markle has inked a deal with Disney. Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO talks to us about award VS reward, plus much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
